ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend this course for students who want to understand the technological needs of the medical and biomedical community as well as the computational techniques to address these needs.
A class to let you know more about medicine and information. Yes I would recommend. It is good to learn some basics.
It is an introductory class and it is helpful. I would recommend CBB740 to my fellow students because I believe it is helpful in learning the basics in bioinformatics research work and programming.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course strongly contributed to my research as I have gained hands on experience with computational techniques and programming.
I majored in basic medical science in my undergrad. So I know a lot about medicine but a little about information. This course helps me learn more about their combination and the information tools.
The process of solving the homework has deepen my knowledge in how to get the real work done in bioinformatics research.
This was a helpful introduction to techniques that can be used in bioinformatics
